import ReactDOM from "react-dom" import React, { Suspense, useEffect, useRef, useMemo, useState, setState, Fragment } from "react" import { Canvas, Dom, useLoader, useFrame } from "react-three-fiber" import { TextureLoader, LinearFilter } from "three" import lerp from "lerp" import { Text, MultilineText } from "./components/Text" import Diamonds from "./diamonds/Diamonds" import Plane from "./components/Plane" import { Block, useBlock } from "./blocks" import state from "./store" import "./styles.css" import ModalVideo from 'react-modal-video' function Startup() { const ref = useRef() useFrame(() => (ref.current.material.opacity = lerp(ref.current.material.opacity, 0, 0.025))) return } function Paragraph({ image, index, offset, factor, header, aspect, text }) { const [isOpen, setOpen] = useState(false) const { contentMaxWidth: w, canvasWidth, margin, mobile } = useBlock() const size = aspect < 1 && !mobile ? 0.65 : 1 const alignRight = (canvasWidth - w * size - margin) / 2 const pixelWidth = w * state.zoom * size const left = !(index % 2) const color = index % 2 ? "#D40749" : "#2FE8C3" return ( {/* setOpen(true)} > */} {/* */}
{text}
 {header} click to view ) } function Content() { const images = useLoader( TextureLoader, state.paragraphs.map(({ image }) => image) ) useMemo(() => images.forEach(texture => (texture.minFilter = LinearFilter)), [images]) const { contentMaxWidth: w, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, mobile } = useBlock() return ( <> MOKSHA It was the year 2076.{mobile ?
: " "}The substance had arrived. {state.paragraphs.map((props, index) => ( ))} {state.stripes.map(({ offset, color, height }, index) => ( ))} Culture is not your friend. ) } function Modal({setNow, state}){ const [isOpen, setOpen] = useState(false) state.paragraphs.map(paragraph => { return ( setOpen(setNow)} /> )}) } function App() { const scrollArea = useRef() const onScroll = e => (state.top.current = e.target.scrollTop) useEffect(() => void onScroll({ target: scrollArea.current }), []) const [isOpen, setOpen] = useState(false) var setNow = false return ( <> }> {/* */}
{new Array(state.sections).fill().map((_, index) => (
{ e.stopPropagation() console.log("CLICKED" + index) setNow = true console.log(setNow) }} key={index} id={"0" + index} style={{ height: `${(state.pages / state.sections) * 100}vh` }} />
))}

) } ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById("root"))
